thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan’s show ‘Circus’ back on TV
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan’s show ‘Circus’ back on TV

title: Shah Rukh Khan’s show ‘Circus’ back on TV
text:
Shah Rukh Khan’s show ‘Circus’ back on TV Shah Rukh Khan’s show ‘Circus’ back on TV Currently reading: Shah Rukh Khan’s show ‘Circus’ back on TV #Doordarshan , #Shah Rukh Khan , #Circus , #TV Show , #Tv Shows India TV Entertainment Desk, New Delhi [ Published on: 15 Feb 2017, 10:37:56] Shah Rukh Khan, who started his acting career with TV shows like ‘Fauji’ and ‘Circus’ in the late 1980s, has got some surprises for all his small screen fans in his kitty. His popular show, ‘Circus’ will be aired on TV soon. 
Doordarshan has announced that it will be re-running the episodes of Circus from February 19, onwards. 
The TV show ‘Circus’, that was aired in 1989, depicts about a circus troupe with SRK playing Shekharan, a Malayali circus owner. The show also started Renuka Shahane, Ashutosh Gowariker and Mita Vashisht. 
Doordarshan has tweeted that the show will mark its return on the channel February 19, 8pm onwards. Now, that's great news! X
